br.ufrj.ct.restauranteuniversitario

Class RUSingleton

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.ufrj.ct.restauranteuniversitario.RUSingleton

  • public class RUSingleton
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Felipe Podolan Oliveira on 05/01/17. This class is a singleton to add Volley HTTP requests to the request queue
